text: Sihamta sanmilitabharae tomalokara lagata yud'dha karaiba noraaraiba, yud'dha karaile'o suraksita janabasatira majata arasthana karai athaba berara amra laihe karaiba; sihamta parasparaika biraodhitata ati kathora. Tumi sihamtaka aikyabad'dha buli bhaba; kintu sihamtara antarasamuhata mila na'i; e'ito e'i babe'i ye, sihamta eta nirbodha sampradaya
